oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The mode of preparation of the !nabbe ( . . . . ), made from the tail hair of various animals. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-11. 7005 rev.-7007 rev.). The tail and tail-hair of various jackals and foxes are compared and used in the making of the brush.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: !nabbe The
